snippet: About 4 percent of the electorate has a favorable view of Mr. Obama, but does not approve of his job performance. The way those voters behave in November could be decisive.
abstract: About 4 percent of the electorate has a favorable view of Mr. Obama, but does not approve of his job performance. The way those voters behave in November could be decisive.

headline.main: Why Obama May Be Stronger Than His Approval Ratings
